程序包的使用
Model

  • 使用Model的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    Controller  
    Model  
    View  
  • Controller使用的Model中的类 
    类和说明
    Risk_Model
    This class is the model for the Risk program.
  • Model使用的Model中的类 
    类和说明
    Board
    This class sets up the countries and continents on the Risk game board.
    Card
    Allows the creation of Risk Card objects.
    Continent
    Allows the creation of Risk Continent objects.
    Country
    Allows the creation of Risk Country objects.
    Deck
    Allows the creation of the Risk deck containing total Risk cards.
    Hand
    Allows the creation of Risk Hand objects used to handle the cards held by a player.
    Player
    Allows the creation of Risk player objects.
    Risk_Model
    This class is the model for the Risk program.
  • View使用的Model中的类 
    类和说明
    Board
    This class sets up the countries and continents on the Risk game board.
    CountryLabel
    Allows the creation of JLists with updating strings from the RiskModel.
    Risk_Model
    This class is the model for the Risk program.
    RiskListModel
    Allows the creation of JLists with updating strings from the RiskModel.
